subject: ATTON OWNER BENEFICIARY
body:
Greetings to you my good friend
 How are you doing today?

  This is Mr BRIAN T. MOYNIHAN. the chairman of the Federal Reserve Bank of
New York

 Am glad to inform you that your compensation funds which values ​​the total
 sum of $15.7 million USD was deposited here in my bank on the 30th of
January
 2022 with your file
 I went through your files and discovered that it has been in the Federal
 Government Custody for a few months and I have made every arrangement for
you
 to start receiving your funds today with any of the payment options stated
 below so you have to choose how you want your funds to be  delivered to you
 from the two options.

 Choose how you want to receive your funds below and we will proceed with
 your request immediately.

 1. Delivery in cash your rightful fund will be registered and delivered to
you

 2. ATM CARD DELIVERY: I will credit your total funds into an ATM card and
 I will deliver your ATM CARD to your home address, this will take 48
 to 72 hours for your ATM CARD to get to you depending on the distance.
 And with the government issued delivery code:

 So get back to me with this number on text message or email as soon as
possible with any of the options above so i
 can proceed immediatel

 Thank you
